      • getSpawnDelay

        public int getSpawnDelay()
        Gets the current, live-updated spawn delay. When this delay reaches 0, the mob is spawned.
        Returns:
        Mob spawn delay counter

      • setSpawnDelay

        public void setSpawnDelay(int tickDelay)
